column4: Also, anyone knows why i loose my 5.1 sound, back to stereo when i listen to a music ? This happens when i change song (manual or automatic) or when i stop the playback and start again.
can it be something with the player's configuration ?
this happens with ALL the players. Totem, Rhythmbox, Exail. I dont think thats a players issue (Also, i use Lucid Lynx)
